languages.text: "Это верно. Обычно поезда пускают на кораблях классом повыше, но с {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Патентом{/g} Вольного Торговца и не такое возможно. Это предшественник Леди Теодоры постарался — по его велению Адептус Механикус помогли чуду священной инженерии родиться в утробе флагмана династии".

"That is true. Usually higher-class ships are the ones that get trains, but it's far from the greatest thing a Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} can see done. The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor, on whose orders the Adeptus Mechanicus assisted in birthing this miracle of sacred engineering from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."
languages.original_text: "Это верно. Обычно поезда пускают на кораблях классом повыше, но с {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Патентом{/g} Вольного Торговца и не такое возможно. Это предшественник Леди Теодоры постарался — по его велению Адептус Механикус помогли чуду священной инженерии родиться в утробе флагмана династии".

traits.locale_text: "That is true. It's usually ships of higher classes that get trains, but it's far from the greatest thing a Rogue Trader's Warrant can get done. The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor. It was on his orders that the Adeptus Mechanicus helped a miracle of sacred engineering be born from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."

It was on his orders that the Adeptus Mechanicus helped a miracle of sacred engineering be born from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."

The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor, on whose orders the Adeptus Mechanicus assisted in birthing this miracle of sacred engineering from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."

languages.text: «Eso es cierto. Normalmente son las naves de mayor clase las que incluyen trenes, pero esto dista mucho de ser lo más notable que se ha hecho con una {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Patente{/g} de Comerciante Independiente. En este caso, el mérito corresponde al predecesor de lady Theodora, bajo cuyas órdenes el Adeptus Mechanicus ayudó a crear este milagro de ingeniería sagrada en la nave insignia de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "That is true. Usually higher-class ships are the ones that get trains, but it's far from the greatest thing a Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} can see done. The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor, on whose orders the Adeptus Mechanicus assisted in birthing this miracle of sacred engineering from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es cierto. Normalmente son las naves de mayor clase las que incluyen trenes, pero esto dista mucho de ser lo más notable que se ha hecho con una Patente de Comerciante Independiente. En este caso, el mérito corresponde al predecesor de lady Theodora, bajo cuyas órdenes el Adeptus Mechanicus ayudó a crear este milagro de ingeniería sagrada en la nave insignia de la dinastía».

languages.text: 「そのとおりです。通常、列車を手に入れるのはより高位の船ですが、ローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}令状{/g}が最大限可能とするものとにはほど遠い。この功績はシオドーラ様の前任者のものです。その命令で、帝国技術局がこの神聖なる工学の奇跡を王朝の旗艦の至急から誕生させたのです」
languages.original_text: "That is true. Usually higher-class ships are the ones that get trains, but it's far from the greatest thing a Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} can see done. The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor, on whose orders the Adeptus Mechanicus assisted in birthing this miracle of sacred engineering from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりです。通常、列車を手に入れるのはより高位の船ですが、ローグトレーダーの令状が最大限可能とするものとにはほど遠い。この功績はシオドーラ様の前任者のものです。その命令で、帝国技術局がこの神聖なる工学の奇跡を王朝の旗艦の至急から誕生させたのです」

languages.text: “确实如此。通常情况下，只有高阶舰船才允许配备列车，但这样的特权与行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}授状{/g}赋予的全部特权相比，不过是九牛一毛。这一切都要归功于西奥多拉夫人的前任行商浪人。在那位伟人的授意下，机械修会的成员提供了协助，让王朝旗舰的子宫孕育出了这件神圣工程的奇迹。”
languages.original_text: "That is true. Usually higher-class ships are the ones that get trains, but it's far from the greatest thing a Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} can see done. The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor, on whose orders the Adeptus Mechanicus assisted in birthing this miracle of sacred engineering from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。通常情况下，只有高阶舰船才允许配备列车，但这样的特权与行商浪人的授状赋予的全部特权相比，不过是九牛一毛。这一切都要归功于西奥多拉夫人的前任行商浪人。在那位伟人的授意下，机械修会的成员提供了协助，让王朝旗舰的子宫孕育出了这件神圣工程的奇迹。”
“确实如此。通常情况下，只有高阶舰船才允许配备列车，但这样的特权与行商浪人的授{g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}状{/g}赋予的全部特权相比，不过是九牛一毛。这一切都要归功于西奥多拉夫人的前任行商浪人。在那位伟人的授意下，机械修会的成员提供了协助，让王朝旗舰的子宫孕育出了这件神圣工程的奇迹。”

languages.text: "Das ist wahr. Normalerweise erhalten nur Schiffe höherer Klassen Eisenbahnen, aber so ein Freihändler-{g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Handelsbrief{/g} kann noch weit größere Dinge bewirken. In diesem Fall war Lady Theodoras Vorgänger verantwortlich, auf dessen Befehl der Adeptus Mechanicus beim Bau dieses heiligen Wunders der Ingenieurskunst im Bauch des Flaggschiffs der Dynastie geholfen hat."
languages.original_text: "That is true. Usually higher-class ships are the ones that get trains, but it's far from the greatest thing a Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} can see done. The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor, on whose orders the Adeptus Mechanicus assisted in birthing this miracle of sacred engineering from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."

"Das ist wahr. Normalerweise erhalten nur Schiffe höherer Klassen Eisenbahnen, aber so ein Freihändler-Handelsbrief kann noch weit größere Dinge bewirken. In diesem Fall war Lady Theodoras Vorgänger verantwortlich, auf dessen Befehl der Adeptus Mechanicus beim Bau dieses heiligen Wunders der Ingenieurskunst im Bauch des Flaggschiffs der Dynastie geholfen hat."

languages.text: « C'est vrai. Les trains sont généralement réservés aux vaisseaux de classe supérieure, mais quand on a une {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}lettre de marque{/g} de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, j'imagine qu'on peut tout se permettre. Le mérite en revient néanmoins au prédécesseur de dame Théodora. C'est sur ses ordres que l'Adeptus Mechanicus a aidé à faire naître ce miracle d'ingénierie sacrée dans les entrailles du vaisseau amiral de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "That is true. languages.text: "Bu doğru. Genellikle üst sınıf gemilerin trenleri olur ancak Hür Tacir {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Ruhsatnamesi{/g} ile yapılabileceklerin yanında bu hiçbir şey. Burada övgüyü hak eden, Leydi Theodora'nın selefidir. Adeptus Mechanicus, hanedanlık sancak gemisinin rahminden bu kutsal mühendislik mucizesinin doğmasına onun emirleri doğrultusunda yardım etmiştir."
languages.original_text: "That is true. Usually higher-class ships are the ones that get trains, but it's far from the greatest thing a Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} can see done. The credit here goes to Lady Theodora's predecessor, on whose orders the Adeptus Mechanicus assisted in birthing this miracle of sacred engineering from the womb of the dynasty's flagship."
